If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.

If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:50:48.210 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:50:48.216 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:51:02.917 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:51:02.924 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:51:04.704 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"

    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0

        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:51:39.188 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:51:49.123 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:51:52.722 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:51:52.729 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:52:13.231 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:52:13.238 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:52:15.367 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:52:15.372 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

) AS t

2024-09-05 17:52:25.480 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:52:25.485 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"

    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (

    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:52:48.528 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

) AS t

2024-09-05 17:53:23.768 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:53:30.027 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:53:30.035 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:53:34.407 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:53:45.824 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:53:45.830 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:53:55.214 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:57:56.549 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 17:58:22.414 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.30 initialized 'ECommerceAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2024-09-05 17:58:22.418 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 17:58:22.424 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:03:14.187 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:03:14.334 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:03:16.938 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.30 initialized 'ECommerceAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2024-09-05 18:03:16.942 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:03:16.948 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:11:49.050 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:12:02.895 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:12:10.051 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Name", t1."Price", t1."Stock", t1."UpdatedDate", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate"
FROM (
    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", t."Id" AS "Id0", t."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t."ProductImageFilesId", t."ProductsId"
    FROM "Files" AS f
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT p0."Id", p0."CreatedDate", p0."Name", p0."Price", p0."Stock", p0."UpdatedDate", p."ProductImageFilesId", p."ProductsId"
        FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p
        INNER JOIN "Products" AS p0 ON p."ProductsId" = p0."Id"
    ) AS t ON f."Id" = t."ProductImageFilesId"
    WHERE (f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile') AND ((t."Id" = @__Parse_0) AND f."Showcase")
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0

    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p1
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p2 ON p1."ProductsId" = p2."Id"
) AS t1 ON t0."Id" = t1."ProductImageFilesId"
ORDER BY t0."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:12:27.122 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:12:27.128 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (

    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

WHERE "ProductImageFilesId" = @p0 AND "ProductsId" = @p1;

    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:27:25.023 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:28:06.066 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:28:17.717 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:30:02.565 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.30 initialized 'ECommerceAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2024-09-05 18:30:02.601 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Name", t1."Price", t1."Stock", t1."UpdatedDate", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate"
FROM (
    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", t."Id" AS "Id0", t."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t."ProductImageFilesId", t."ProductsId"
    FROM "Files" AS f
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT p0."Id", p0."CreatedDate", p0."Name", p0."Price", p0."Stock", p0."UpdatedDate", p."ProductImageFilesId", p."ProductsId"
        FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p
        INNER JOIN "Products" AS p0 ON p."ProductsId" = p0."Id"
    ) AS t ON f."Id" = t."ProductImageFilesId"
    WHERE (f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile') AND ((t."Id" = @__Parse_0) AND f."Showcase")
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p1."ProductImageFilesId", p1."ProductsId", p2."Id", p2."CreatedDate", p2."Name", p2."Price", p2."Stock", p2."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p1
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p2 ON p1."ProductsId" = p2."Id"
) AS t1 ON t0."Id" = t1."ProductImageFilesId"
ORDER BY t0."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId"
2024-09-05 18:30:02.624 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

FROM (
    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", t."Id" AS "Id0", t."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t."ProductImageFilesId", t."ProductsId"
    FROM "Files" AS f
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT p0."Id", p0."CreatedDate", p0."Name", p0."Price", p0."Stock", p0."UpdatedDate", p."ProductImageFilesId", p."ProductsId"
        FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p
        INNER JOIN "Products" AS p0 ON p."ProductsId" = p0."Id"
    ) AS t ON f."Id" = t."ProductImageFilesId"
    WHERE (f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile') AND (f."Id" = @__Parse_0)
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p1."ProductImageFilesId", p1."ProductsId", p2."Id", p2."CreatedDate", p2."Name", p2."Price", p2."Stock", p2."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p1
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p2 ON p1."ProductsId" = p2."Id"
) AS t1 ON t0."Id" = t1."ProductImageFilesId"
ORDER BY t0."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:44:55.116 +03:00 [WRN] The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results. If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.
2024-09-05 18:44:55.367 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:45:39.756 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"

        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

2024-09-05 18:46:00.018 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Name", t1."Price", t1."Stock", t1."UpdatedDate", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate"
FROM (
    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", t."Id" AS "Id0", t."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t."ProductImageFilesId", t."ProductsId"
    FROM "Files" AS f
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT p0."Id", p0."CreatedDate", p0."Name", p0."Price", p0."Stock", p0."UpdatedDate", p."ProductImageFilesId", p."ProductsId"
        FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p
        INNER JOIN "Products" AS p0 ON p."ProductsId" = p0."Id"
    ) AS t ON f."Id" = t."ProductImageFilesId"
    WHERE (f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile') AND ((t."Id" = @__Parse_0) AND f."Showcase")
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p1."ProductImageFilesId", p1."ProductsId", p2."Id", p2."CreatedDate", p2."Name", p2."Price", p2."Stock", p2."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p1
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p2 ON p1."ProductsId" = p2."Id"
) AS t1 ON t0."Id" = t1."ProductImageFilesId"

) AS t1 ON t0."Id" = t1."ProductImageFilesId"

2024-09-05 18:46:20.875 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:47:32.293 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:47:44.426 +03:00 [INF] Get all products
2024-09-05 18:47:44.428 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.30 initialized 'ECommerceAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2024-09-05 18:47:44.434 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:47:44.439 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:48:15.645 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:48:20.076 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:48:20.082 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:48:55.685 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT

2024-09-05 18:49:03.856 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:51:19.446 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:51:19.453 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:51:22.515 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:51:25.189 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-05 18:51:25.196 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-05 18:51:26.882 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-06 19:02:31.943 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-06 19:02:31.952 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t."UserId", t0."Id", t0."BasketId", t0."CreatedDate", t0."ProductId", t0."Quantity", t0."UpdatedDate", t0."Id0", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate0"

    SELECT b."Id", b."CreatedDate", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId"
    FROM "Baskets" AS b

    LIMIT 1
) AS t

    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."BasketId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-06 19:05:19.513 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.30 initialized 'ECommerceAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2024-09-06 19:05:19.518 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-06 19:05:19.525 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-06 19:05:45.313 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__basket_Id_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t."UserId", t0."Id", t0."BasketId", t0."CreatedDate", t0."ProductId", t0."Quantity", t0."UpdatedDate", t0."Id0", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate0"
FROM (
    SELECT b."Id", b."CreatedDate", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId"
    FROM "Baskets" AS b
    WHERE b."Id" = @__basket_Id_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."BasketId"

2024-09-06 19:05:45.354 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2024-09-06 19:05:45.359 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t."UserId", t0."Id", t0."BasketId", t0."CreatedDate", t0."ProductId", t0."Quantity", t0."UpdatedDate", t0."Id0", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate0"

    SELECT b."Id", b."CreatedDate", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId"
    FROM "Baskets" AS b

) AS t

    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."BasketId"

2024-09-06 19:06:06.148 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-06 19:07:29.562 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-06 19:08:14.084 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2024-09-06 19:08:17.448 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
